full_threads.body:
Hi Belinda, 

Confirming the most recent round of updates have been completed. Below is a recap with any relevant links. 

1. The main menu naming conventions have been reverted to full title. 

2. https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/products/ has been updated with all 8 tiles

3. Parent pages created for the following:
https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/partitioning-systems/
https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/privacy-panels/
https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/locker-systems/
https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/bench-seating/
https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/vanity-bench/

Please note, with the "split" of products in to the new categories, we are still awaiting updates on content roll-out. e.g. https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/product/wall-with-shelving-bsw-s/

4. https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/product/3000-series-toilet-and-shower-partitions-pedestal-mounted-overhead-braced/ has been updated to single "Revit" button taking the user to the architect login page. 

We are also standing by for your instructions on how to proceed with managing the Revit files - specifically how you wish to proceed with increased website capacity.

Hi Glen,

Let’s work through these once we clear some tickets.

Hi Chris,

Thankyou for your time earlier today. As discussed please proceed with the following amendments:
Please fix the link from the Partitioning System Image to the page with the Partitioning System render images.
Just Noticed this change: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/products/
Please create Parent Pages for:
PRIVACY PANELS
LOCKER SYSTEMS
BENCH SEATING
VANITY BENCH
as per example on page 3 – Partitioning Systems in Duracube Wire Frame Mock-up V3.pdf

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you need any clarification on the instructions provided.

Kind regards,
Belinda
